/* BoardMapper.getBoardList */
SELECT A.TOP_AT, A.BOARD_NO, A.BOARD_VIEW, A.BOARD_TITLE, B.NAME, A.RANK, A.TOTCNT FROM (
SELECT 'TOP' AS TOP_AT, ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC) AS RANK, A.BOARD_NO, A.BOARD_VIEW, A.BOARD_TITLE, A.NOTICE_AT, A.CATEGORY_NO, A.DELETE_AT, A.EMAIL, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD A WHERE A.NOTICE_AT = 'Y' AND A.CATEGORY_NO = #{category} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' ) AS TOTCNT FROM TB_BOARD A WHERE A.NOTICE_AT = 'Y' AND A.CATEGORY_NO = #{category} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'BOTTOM' AS TOP_AT, ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC) AS RANK, A.BOARD_NO, A.BOARD_VIEW, A.BOARD_TITLE, A.NOTICE_AT, A.CATEGORY_NO, A.DELETE_AT, A.EMAIL, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD A WHERE A.NOTICE_AT = 'N' AND A.CATEGORY_NO = #{category} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' ) AS TOTCNT FROM TB_BOARD A WHERE A.NOTICE_AT = 'N' AND A.CATEGORY_NO = #{category} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON A.EMAIL = B.EMAIL WHERE A.RANK <= A.TOTCNT

/* BoardMapper.getBoardListCnt */
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (
SELECT 'TOP' AS TOP_AT, ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC) AS RANK, A.BOARD_NO, A.BOARD_VIEW, A.BOARD_TITLE, A.NOTICE_AT, A.CATEGORY_NO, A.DELETE_AT, A.EMAIL, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD A WHERE A.NOTICE_AT = 'Y' AND A.CATEGORY_NO = #{category} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' ) AS TOTCNT FROM TB_BOARD A WHERE A.NOTICE_AT = 'Y' AND A.CATEGORY_NO = #{category} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'BOTTOM' AS TOP_AT, ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC) AS RANK, A.BOARD_NO, A.BOARD_VIEW, A.BOARD_TITLE, A.NOTICE_AT, A.CATEGORY_NO, A.DELETE_AT, A.EMAIL, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD A WHERE A.NOTICE_AT = 'N' AND A.CATEGORY_NO = #{category} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' ) AS TOTCNT FROM TB_BOARD A WHERE A.NOTICE_AT = 'N' AND A.CATEGORY_NO = #{category} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON A.EMAIL = B.EMAIL WHERE A.RANK <= A.TOTCNT

/* BoardMapper.selectOneBoard */
SELECT A.BOARD_TITLE, A.BOARD_CONTENT, A.FILE_ID, A.BOARD_VIEW, A.EMAIL, A.NOTICE_AT, A.BOARD_NO, B.NAME FROM TB_BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON B.EMAIL = A.EMAIL WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

/* BoardMapper.selectBoardFiles */
SELECT A.FILE_ID, B.ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, B.RENAMED_FILE_NAME, B.FILE_SN, B.FILE_STORE FROM TB_FILE A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FILE_DETAIL B ON B.FILE_ID = A.FILE_ID WHERE A.USE_AT = 'Y' AND A.FILE_ID = #{fileId}

/* BoardMapper.getMaxFileSn */
SELECT MAX(FILE_SN) FROM TB_FILE_DETAIL WHERE FILE_ID = #{fileId}

/* BoardMapper.getCategoryList */
SELECT A.CATEGORY_NAME, A.CATEGORY_NO FROM TB_CATEGORY A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY_USER B ON B.CATEGORY_NO = A.CATEGORY_NO WHERE B.EMAIL = #{email} AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N'

/* BoardMapper.getCategoryName */
SELECT CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} AND DELETE_AT = 'N'
mapper.update:
/* BoardMapper.updateBoard */
UPDATE TB_BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{title}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{content}, NOTICE_AT = #{noticeAt}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{email} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

/* BoardMapper.deleteBoard */
UPDATE TB_BOARD SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
